text: Engineers rate communication skills as
the number one most important factor for
advancing a career in engineering my
name is Matt Vasser and for almost 20
years I've taught one of the most
popular courses on the entire Stanford
campus I also work with leaders in Tech
at companies like apple Google and Gap
in order to level up their Communication
in our course together we're going to
talk about evidence-based strategies
scientifically proven to work so that
you can get Buy in from your
stakeholders so that you can talk about
the value of your Technical Solutions
and how you can gain trust from within
your teams one of the Hallmarks of this
course is that you will have Hands-On
opportunities to practice you will get
opportunities experientially to try out
the communication strategies that you're
working on you'll have opportunities
where you can engage with real life
colleagues to practice the communication
that will get you results these aren't
abstract wishy-washy ideas they're
concrete you'll come out of the course
with a large number of strategies so
that your communication ideas will land
are you ready to get started I can't
wait
